mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BLOG (URL, NAME, DESCRIPTION, USER_ID) VALUES (#{url}, #{name}, #{description}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, B.URL, B.NAME, B.DESCRIPTION, B.USER_ID FROM BLOG B, ACCOUNT A WHERE B.USER_ID = A.ID AND A.STATUS = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY A.CREATED_AT DESC ) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{pageSize} + 1 AND #{pageNum} * #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) FROM BLOG, ACCOUNT WHERE ACCOUNT.STATUS = 'ACTIVE'
